title: Garena
body: Hi, im from garena, and i wanna join in oce sever, can i ask that do we have any transfer for garena into Oce sever?

replies.body:
Hey Yiru,

Unfortunately, there's no transferring between the Garena and OCE regions, and as far as I'm aware, Riot has not discussed having this feature available in the foreseeable future. For now, if you'd like to play on the OCE servers, you'll have to level up a new account. Sorry; I know that's not the answer you're looking for. If you have any additional questions, don't hesitate to ask.

i know, dont worry, i know that they dont have that transfer, but i rmb we have that before lol :"( but that time im not come here yet, but now im looking for it, so i hope we have it again then i can have that convenience :( btwe, thks for that, help me a lot man hahaha
